tool_description: Check if URL is live or parse and extract site meta data from any website using our free API
name: URL Checker and Parser
title: URL Checker and Parser

api_list.name: parser
api_list.description: Parse and extract site meta data from any website - returns title, description, image, author etc.

api_list.name: checker
api_list.description: Checks URL for their status - returns status code and message. API can detect broken links. API can be used to check if a web server is up or down
